content.description:
Ms. Fox conducted a study to see if there was a relationship between the Big Five trait of conscientiousness and final grades in her class. She randomly sampled data from seven students, whose conscientiousness scores and final grades are indicated in the table.

Conscientious Score and Final Grade

Student
 Conscientiousness Score
 Final Grade (%)

A
 10
 92

B
 6
 69

C
 9
 84

D
 4
 63

E
 3
 55

F
 5
 72

G
 4
 81
content.question: Which of the following graphs best depicts the results of Ms. Foxâ€™s study?

content.answer:
The scatterplot has 7 data points.

The values are approximate.

The data points are as follows:
